name: Area 51: Weeb Defense
description:
So this was a small project made in response to the Area 51 raid. Think they have a chance? Not with the newest / most advanced weaponry the military has been working on!

You can press 'M' to mute the music if needed.

Press 'Space Bar' To skip the countdown between waves.

Any additions wanted for the game please ask! Bugs may be present.
